segments.text: Have you got any specific proposal about the terms of payment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wonder if we can make payment for this order by documentary collection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to say the only term of payment we can accept is 100 % irrevocable letter of credit payable against shipping documents .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But our order this time is very large . To open an L / C for such a large amount at a bank is costly . Can you be a bit more flexible and bend the rule a little ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid not . We insist on a letter of credit , because as seller , we also have the problem of funds being tied up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To be frank , a letter of credit would increase the cost of my import . When I open a letter of credit with a bank , I have to pay a deposit . That will tie up my money and add to my cost .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Consult your bank and see if they will reduce the required deposit to a minimum .
segments.speaker: S1
